trans-unit.source: Configure Asset Delivery Policies using REST
trans-unit.target: Configure Asset Delivery Policies using REST

trans-unit.source: This topic shows how to configure different asset delivery policies.
trans-unit.target: This topic shows how to configure different asset delivery policies.

trans-unit.source: How to: Configure Asset Delivery Policies
trans-unit.target: How to: Configure Asset Delivery Policies

trans-unit.source: If you plan to deliver dynamically encrypted assets, one of the steps in the Media Services content delivery workflow is configuring delivery policies for assets.
trans-unit.target: If you plan to deliver dynamically encrypted assets, one of the steps in the Media Services content delivery workflow is configuring delivery policies for assets.

trans-unit.source: The asset delivery policy tells Media Services how you want for your asset to be delivered: into which streaming protocol should your asset be dynamically packaged (for example, MPEG DASH, HLS, Smooth Streaming, or all), whether or not you want to dynamically encrypt your asset and how (envelope or common encryption).
trans-unit.target: The asset delivery policy tells Media Services how you want for your asset to be delivered: into which streaming protocol should your asset be dynamically packaged (for example, MPEG DASH, HLS, Smooth Streaming, or all), whether or not you want to dynamically encrypt your asset and how (envelope or common encryption).

trans-unit.source: This topic discusses why and how to create and configure asset delivery policies.
trans-unit.target: This topic discusses why and how to create and configure asset delivery policies.

trans-unit.source: To be able to use dynamic packaging and dynamic encryption, you must make sure to have at least one scale unit (also known as streaming unit).
trans-unit.target: To be able to use dynamic packaging and dynamic encryption, you must make sure to have at least one scale unit (also known as streaming unit).

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link><linkText>How to Scale a Media Service</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link><linkText>How to Scale a Media Service</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Also, your asset must contain a set of adaptive bitrate MP4s or adaptive bitrate Smooth Streaming files.
trans-unit.target: Also, your asset must contain a set of adaptive bitrate MP4s or adaptive bitrate Smooth Streaming files.

trans-unit.source: You could apply different policies to the same asset.
trans-unit.target: You could apply different policies to the same asset.

trans-unit.source: For example, you could apply PlayReady encryption to Smooth Streaming and AES Envelope encryption to MPEG DASH and HLS.
trans-unit.target: For example, you could apply PlayReady encryption to Smooth Streaming and AES Envelope encryption to MPEG DASH and HLS.

trans-unit.source: Any protocols that are not defined in a delivery policy (for example, you add a single policy that only specifies HLS as the protocol) will be blocked from streaming.
trans-unit.target: Any protocols that are not defined in a delivery policy (for example, you add a single policy that only specifies HLS as the protocol) will be blocked from streaming.

trans-unit.source: The exception to this is if you have no asset delivery policy defined at all.
trans-unit.target: The exception to this is if you have no asset delivery policy defined at all.

trans-unit.source: Then, all protocols will be allowed in the clear.
trans-unit.target: Then, all protocols will be allowed in the clear.

trans-unit.source: Note that if your want to delivery a storage encrypted asset, you must configure the asset’s delivery policy.
trans-unit.target: Note that if your want to delivery a storage encrypted asset, you must configure the asset’s delivery policy.

trans-unit.source: Before your asset can be streamed, the streaming server removes the storage encryption and streams your content using the specified delivery policy.
trans-unit.target: Before your asset can be streamed, the streaming server removes the storage encryption and streams your content using the specified delivery policy.

trans-unit.source: For example, to deliver your asset encrypted with Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) envelope encryption key, set the policy type to DynamicEnvelopeEncryption.
trans-unit.target: For example, to deliver your asset encrypted with Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) envelope encryption key, set the policy type to DynamicEnvelopeEncryption.

trans-unit.source: To remove storage encryption and stream the asset in the clear, set the policy type to NoDynamicEncryption.
trans-unit.target: To remove storage encryption and stream the asset in the clear, set the policy type to NoDynamicEncryption.

trans-unit.source: Examples that show how to configure these policy types follow.
trans-unit.target: Examples that show how to configure these policy types follow.

trans-unit.source: Depending on how you configure the asset delivery policy you would be able to dynamically package, dynamically encrypt, and stream the following streaming protocols: Smooth Streaming, HLS, MPEG DASH, and HDS streams.
trans-unit.target: Depending on how you configure the asset delivery policy you would be able to dynamically package, dynamically encrypt, and stream the following streaming protocols: Smooth Streaming, HLS, MPEG DASH, and HDS streams.

trans-unit.source: The following list shows the formats that you use to stream Smooth, HLS, DASH and HDS.
trans-unit.target: The following list shows the formats that you use to stream Smooth, HLS, DASH and HDS.

trans-unit.source: Smooth Streaming:
trans-unit.target: Smooth Streaming:

trans-unit.source: HLS:
trans-unit.target: HLS:

trans-unit.source: MPEG DASH
trans-unit.target: MPEG DASH

trans-unit.source: HDS
trans-unit.target: HDS

trans-unit.source: For instructions on how to publish an asset and build a streaming URL, see <link><linkText>Build a streaming URL</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For instructions on how to publish an asset and build a streaming URL, see <link><linkText>Build a streaming URL</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: When working with the Media Services REST API, the following considerations apply:
trans-unit.target: When working with the Media Services REST API, the following considerations apply:

trans-unit.source: When accessing entities in Media Services, you must set specific header fields and values in your HTTP requests.
trans-unit.target: When accessing entities in Media Services, you must set specific header fields and values in your HTTP requests.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link><linkText>Setup for Media Services REST API Development</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link><linkText>Setup for Media Services REST API Development</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: After successfully connecting to https://media.windows.net, you will receive a 301 redirect specifying another Media Services URI.
trans-unit.target: After successfully connecting to https://media.windows.net, you will receive a 301 redirect specifying another Media Services URI.

trans-unit.source: You must make subsequent calls to the new URI as described in <link><linkText>Connecting to Media Services using REST API</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: You must make subsequent calls to the new URI as described in <link><linkText>Connecting to Media Services using REST API</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Clear asset delivery policy
trans-unit.target: Clear asset delivery policy

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>Create asset delivery policy
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>Create asset delivery policy

trans-unit.source: The following HTTP request creates an asset delivery policy that specifies to not apply dynamic encryption and to deliver the stream in any of the following protocols: MPEG DASH, HLS, and Smooth Streaming protocols.
trans-unit.target: The following HTTP request creates an asset delivery policy that specifies to not apply dynamic encryption and to deliver the stream in any of the following protocols: MPEG DASH, HLS, and Smooth Streaming protocols.

trans-unit.source: For information on what values you can specify when creating an AssetDeliveryPolicy, see the <link><linkText>Types used when defining AssetDeliveryPolicy</linkText><title></title></link> section.
trans-unit.target: For information on what values you can specify when creating an AssetDeliveryPolicy, see the <link><linkText>Types used when defining AssetDeliveryPolicy</linkText><title></title></link> section.

trans-unit.target: Request:

trans-unit.target: Response:

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>Link asset with asset delivery policy
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>Link asset with asset delivery policy

trans-unit.source: The following HTTP request links the specified asset to the asset delivery policy to.
trans-unit.target: The following HTTP request links the specified asset to the asset delivery policy to.

trans-unit.source: Request:
trans-unit.target: Request:

trans-unit.source: Response:
trans-unit.target: Response:

trans-unit.source: DynamicEnvelopeEncryption asset delivery policy
trans-unit.target: DynamicEnvelopeEncryption asset delivery policy

trans-unit.source: Create content key of the EnvelopeEncryption type and link it to the asset
trans-unit.target: Create content key of the EnvelopeEncryption type and link it to the asset

trans-unit.source: When specifying DynamicEnvelopeEncryption delivery policy, you need to make sure to link your asset to a content key of the EnvelopeEncryption type.
trans-unit.target: When specifying DynamicEnvelopeEncryption delivery policy, you need to make sure to link your asset to a content key of the EnvelopeEncryption type.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see: <link><linkText>Creating a content key</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see: <link><linkText>Creating a content key</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>Get delivery URL
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>Get delivery URL

trans-unit.source: Get the delivery URL for the specified delivery method of the content key created in the previous step.
trans-unit.target: Get the delivery URL for the specified delivery method of the content key created in the previous step.

trans-unit.source: A client uses the returned URL to request an AES key or a PlayReady license in order to playback the protected content.
trans-unit.target: A client uses the returned URL to request an AES key or a PlayReady license in order to playback the protected content.

trans-unit.source: Specify the type of the URL to get in the body of the HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Specify the type of the URL to get in the body of the HTTP request.

trans-unit.source: If you are protecting your content with PlayReady, request a Media Services PlayReady license acquisition URL, using 1 for the keyDeliveryType: {"keyDeliveryType":1}.
trans-unit.target: If you are protecting your content with PlayReady, request a Media Services PlayReady license acquisition URL, using 1 for the keyDeliveryType: {"keyDeliveryType":1}.

trans-unit.source: If you are protecting your content with the envelope encryption, request a key acquisition URL by specifying 2 for keyDeliveryType: {"keyDeliveryType":2}.
trans-unit.target: If you are protecting your content with the envelope encryption, request a key acquisition URL by specifying 2 for keyDeliveryType: {"keyDeliveryType":2}.

trans-unit.source: Create asset delivery policy
trans-unit.target: Create asset delivery policy

trans-unit.source: The following HTTP request creates the AssetDeliveryPolicy that is configured to apply dynamic envelope encryption (DynamicEnvelopeEncryption) to the HLS protocol (in this example, other protocols will be blocked from streaming).
trans-unit.target: The following HTTP request creates the AssetDeliveryPolicy that is configured to apply dynamic envelope encryption (DynamicEnvelopeEncryption) to the HLS protocol (in this example, other protocols will be blocked from streaming).

trans-unit.source: For information on what values you can specify when creating an AssetDeliveryPolicy, see the <link><linkText>Types used when defining AssetDeliveryPolicy</linkText><title></title></link> section.
trans-unit.target: For information on what values you can specify when creating an AssetDeliveryPolicy, see the <link><linkText>Types used when defining AssetDeliveryPolicy</linkText><title></title></link> section.

trans-unit.source: DynamicCommonEncryption asset delivery policy
trans-unit.target: DynamicCommonEncryption asset delivery policy

trans-unit.source: Create content key of the CommonEncryption type and link it to the asset
trans-unit.target: Create content key of the CommonEncryption type and link it to the asset

trans-unit.source: When specifying DynamicCommonEncryption delivery policy, you need to make sure to link your asset to a content key of the CommonEncryption type.
trans-unit.target: When specifying DynamicCommonEncryption delivery policy, you need to make sure to link your asset to a content key of the CommonEncryption type.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see: <link><linkText>Creating a content key</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see: <link><linkText>Creating a content key</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.target: Get Delivery URL

trans-unit.source: Get the delivery URL for the PlayReady delivery method of the content key created in the previous step.
trans-unit.target: Get the delivery URL for the PlayReady delivery method of the content key created in the previous step.

trans-unit.source: A client uses the returned URL to request a PlayReady license in order to playback the protected content.
trans-unit.target: A client uses the returned URL to request a PlayReady license in order to playback the protected content.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link><linkText>Get Delivery URL</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Create asset delivery policy

trans-unit.source: The following HTTP request creates the AssetDeliveryPolicy that is configured to apply dynamic common encryption (DynamicCommonEncryption) to the Smooth Streaming protocol (in this example, other protocols will be blocked from streaming).
trans-unit.target: The following HTTP request creates the AssetDeliveryPolicy that is configured to apply dynamic common encryption (DynamicCommonEncryption) to the Smooth Streaming protocol (in this example, other protocols will be blocked from streaming).
